game.name: The Shame of a Daydreamer
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 음량 개별 조정, 키보드 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: In the mind of a daydreamer you find a shameful story set in a world that hides filthy secrets, disturbing lore and complicated families behind cute colors. Be careful - or don’t be. But your choices and actions will have consequences. And sometimes the results can be … out of this world.
